pkgmetadata.longdescription: Paired Lasso Regression // Implements sparse regression with paired covariates (Rauschenberger et al. 2019 doi:10.1007/s11634-019-00375-6). For the optional shrinkage, install ashr (https://github.com/stephens999/ashr) and CorShrink (https://github.com/kkdey/CorShrink) from GitHub (see README).
